title: Tips on matching The Sans with a serif font
content:
Hi!  
I would love your help with matching The Sans to a classic serif typeface. I'm thinking in the likes of Minion, Fairfield or Arno Pro.  
What are you suggestions? Thoughts about the above mentioned? Seems like the Arno and The Sans has a huge difference in x-height...  
Regards  
Johan
author: jdb264c

comments.content: At the risk of being too predictable, why not TheSerif? Or TheAntiqua?
@jdb264c: Why have you chosen to avoid [TheSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195647/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/theserif/)?

[Utopia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195647/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/utopia) and [Kepler](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195647/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/kepler), both by Robert Slimbach, should work.
